results.title: The Birchip Cropping Group
results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: A background history of the Birchip Cropping Group, an agricultural research and extension organisation covering the Wimmera Mallee region set up to assist farmers in crop production. Its philosophy is to produce food that is clean, safe and green. Presented by Alexandra, Fiona, James, Simon and the BCG.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development

Its philosophy is to produce food that is clean, safe and green. Presented by Alexandra, Fiona, James, Simon and the BCG.

results.title: The Music box
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Barbara Tilley and ACMI
results.brief_description: Barbara Tilley’s moving story starts with how she and her brother moved in with her older sister, Marge, to avoid being sent to a home. Ever since that moment, Marge has been the family rock, the one keeping everyone strong through the changes and sadness and keeping the family’s spirit alive.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Barbara Tilley and ACMI
results.description: Barbara Tilley’s moving story starts with how she and her brother moved in with her older sister, Marge, to avoid being sent to a home. results.title: Roundabout winter
results.brief_description:
This stylised short film explores what happens when a happily married second hand bookstore owner flings herself into an extra-marital affair. Unsure of her motivations, the adulterer seeks solace in the bookshelves. Original music by Warran Wright.
Graduate work from RMIT media arts (BA Arts).

results.title: Opposites attract
results.creator_credit: Elin Bakken Tonder and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
A shy retiring little man and his glamourous neighbour share meaningful looks as they pass each other in the hallway. He is entranced by her ravishing outfits, she is a little lonely and thinks ‘why not?’. But there is a twist in the tale of this claymation. Music by Matt Archer.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Elin Bakken Tonder and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT

results.title: A Park for all seasons
results.creator_credit: ACMI Content Development and David Meagher
results.brief_description: Mossvale Park, nestled between Leongatha and Mirboo North in South Gippsland, is host to all types of community events from family barbeques to music festivals. Matt Dennis tells us why he is drawn to this “natural and beautiful place”.
results.description: Mossvale Park, nestled between Leongatha and Mirboo North in South Gippsland, is host to all types of community events from family barbeques to music festivals. Matt Dennis tells us why he is drawn to this “natural and beautiful place”.
